entry.title: Under Senate Bill 31, law enforcement wouldn’t be allowed to...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Under Senate Bill 31, law enforcement wouldn’t be allowed to break up a demonstration unless there was an imminent threat of violence or significant property damage from “a significant number or percentage of persons acting in concert”

Colorado law enforcement would be barred from breaking up a protest unless there is an imminent threat of violence or major property damage from a “significant” number of people acting in unison,…

coloradosun.com

Colorado lawmakers may change when police can intervene in a protest after summer of unrest

Colorado law enforcement would be barred from breaking up a protest unless there is an imminent threat of violence or major property damage from a “significant” number of people acting in unison,…Colorado law enforcement would be barred from breaking up a protest unless there is an imminent threat of violence or major property damage from a “significant” number of people acting in unison,…

entry.title: Tamika Spellman is an advocate, local organizer and has been a...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Tamika Spellman is an advocate, local organizer and has been a community staple for DC’s Trans community. Since September 2019, Tamika has been renting and managing a safe house as part of No Justice No Pride’s Collective housing program. Started by No Justice No Pride in 2018 NJNP Collective Housing has been a vital resource to DC's Trans & Queer Community and the larger Sex Worker Activist network within the DC Area. Since 2018 NJNP’s houses have grown to be one of the larg...est resources of LGBT housing in the city and the only organizations in the Washington DC Metro area providing dedicated housing support to Black and Brown Transgender adults over the age of 24. Tamika manages one of three NJNP houses that are being listed for sale, one after another; by the property owner SK Properties.

#BlackTransLivesMatter #EvictionDefense #MutualAid #WeKeepUsSafe

See MoreTamika Spellman is an advocate, local organizer and has been a community staple for D… Emmelia Ruiz Talarico needs your support for Help us buy Tamika's home!

entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

This is deserved for blatant theft of taxpayer dollars, but we say “Keep this same energy when they murder us.” and it’s too radical. 🙄
#DefundThePolice

An Aurora police officer was fired this week for being untruthful about leaving work early over a period of a month last year, department officials announced Wednesday.

entry.title: Honor the birthday of our self-described "Black, lesbian,...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Honor the birthday of our self-described "Black, lesbian, mother, warrior, poet," ancestor by watching this reading and supporting the work of our siblings carrying her torch.

"The vision for ALP grew out of the expressed need for innovative and unified community strategies to address the multiple issues impacting LGBTSTGNC People of Color communities."

DonateAudre Lorde Project is asking for donations.

Happy 87th Birthday Audre Lorde! The staff of ALP honor this day by reading "A Litany for Survival" together.

entry.title: The pop up museum will be open through April. It is located in...

Black Lives Matter 5280

The pop up museum will be open through April. It is located in RiNo at 1439 26th St., that’s near 26th and Walnut.

Go get your life, y'all!

entry.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280’s Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...
